meaningMnemonic: You have a <radical>small</radical> <radical>slide</radical>. The thing about small slides is that they can only fit a <kanji>few</kanji> people at a time.
readingMnemonic: Why is there <kanji>a little</kanji> traffic jam on the slide? Because the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう) is using the slide and he loves little things. He's forcing everyone to stop and watch, even though there are people backed up behind him. How inconsiderate.
